apiDescription: SipHash is a general-purpose hashing function: it runs at a good speed (competitive with Spooky and City) and permits strong keyed hashing. This lets you key your hashtables from a strong RNG, such as rand::os::OsRng.
Although the SipHash algorithm is considered to be generally strong, it is not intended for cryptographic purposes. As such, all cryptographic uses of this implementation are strongly discouraged.

methods.name: pub fn new_with_keys(key0: u64, key1: u64) -> SipHasher
